title: Honeymoon murder: Sonam kept sharing her live location with Raj on trip
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi allegedly orchestrated her husband's murder during their honeymoon in Meghalaya, with the help of her lover, Raj Kushwaha, and three hired killers. She maintained constant contact with Raj, sharing her location to aid the crime. After her husband was found dead, Sonam was discovered disoriented in Uttar Pradesh.

title: 'Honor killing': Gurgaon executive strangled, set on fire by dad, brother over live-in
content: In Muzaffarnagar, a woman's father and brother have been arrested for allegedly murdering her due to her live-in relationship. Saraswati Maliyan, 23, was strangled and her body set ablaze in a forest. The family initially filed a missing person's report to mislead police. Identification was made through bangles found on the body.

title: Apple announces iOS 26: List of iPhones supported, availability and other things
content: Apple has introduced iOS 26, featuring a Liquid Glass interface and enhanced AI. The update includes a redesigned Photos app, smarter Siri, and a new Passwords app. Users can now mirror their iPhones to Macs. The update also brings improved Messages features and accessibility enhancements. iOS 26 is compatible with iPhone 11 and later models, with developer testing starting today.

title: KSCA pays price for stampede, BCCI shifts matches out of Bengaluru
content: Following a stampede at Bengaluru’s M Chinnaswamy Stadium, the BCCI has shifted the India ‘A’ vs South Africa ‘A’ ODI series to Rajkot. While KSCA denies any link, sources suggest more events could be relocated. Concerns grow over the stadium's condition and Bengaluru’s role as a future cricket venue.

title: Mannat's renovation: Gauri rents a Rs 1.35 Lakh 2 BHK apartment for staff
content: As Mannat undergoes renovation, Gauri Khan has rented a 2BHK apartment in Mumbai’s Pali Hill for her staff at ₹1.35 lakh per month. The Khan family, including Shah Rukh, has shifted to twin luxury duplexes in Puja Casa. Mannat, set to become grander with two additional floors, holds deep emotional value and was originally designed by Gauri herself.

title: 'Being made scapegoat': IPS officer challenges suspension order over Bengaluru stampede
content: Suspended IPS officer Vikash Kumar Vikash challenged his suspension over the June 4 Chinnaswamy Stadium stampede, calling it unjust and claiming he was made a scapegoat. The order cited failure in crowd control but lacked specifics on his alleged negligence. Nearly 30 retired IPS officers urged the CM to revoke the suspensions, stating police had warned organisers about safety risks. They argued that real accountability lies with RCB, KSCA, and event organisers, and punitive action should follow judicial inquiry, not precede it.

title: Steve Jobs told Apple CEO Tim Cook: Never to stay ‘married’ to ..., a skill he says he learnt late
content: Tim Cook credits Steve Jobs with teaching him the invaluable skill of rapidly changing his mind when presented with new evidence, a trait powered by emotional intelligence. Jobs's ability to shift direction and let go of pride influenced Cook and many others, including Jeff Bezos, Jony Ive, and Marc Benioff.

title: Trump refuses to sell red Tesla; here's all you need to know about the high-end Model S
content: Donald Trump has said he has no intention of selling his red Tesla Model S, dismissing speculation during a White House press briefing on Monday. “No, I may move the Tesla around a little bit,” Trump said when asked if he had plans to part ways with the electric car.

title: Nasa’s comet-catching tech inspires fashion revolution with ‘sky in bag’
content: Ioannis Michaloudis, a Greek artist, masterfully blends art and science by transforming NASA's aerogel, initially used to capture comet dust, into ethereal fashion accessories. His journey began with a cloud-shaped vision, leading him to discover aerogel's unique properties. This dedication culminated in the creation of the 'AirSwipe' bag for Coperni, captivating the world and showcasing the potential of science-inspired art.

title: After Microsoft, Google, protest at Apple event: Male employee unzips jacket to reveal
content: An Apple employee disrupted the WWDC keynote, protesting during Craig Federighi's presentation. The protester displayed a keffiyeh and employee badge while shouting inaudibly before being escorted off stage. This incident follows similar protests at Microsoft's Build conference, highlighting growing internal dissent within tech companies regarding ethical responsibilities. The disruption, captured on video, has sparked discussion on social media.

title: Gold price prediction: Where are rates headed on June 10, in near term?
content: Gold price prediction today: The persistent risk of deflation in China's economy, along with favourable ETF movements and weaker-than-expected US employment data for May, provide support to gold prices. In the short term, however, the precious metal's direction is likely to be influenced by the current trade negotiations between the United States and China taking place in London.

title: 'RoKo, stop that': Ex-India cricketer slams clubbing Rohit & Virat together; says 'no comparison'
content: Former India cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar dismissed comparisons between Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma in Test cricket, urging fans and media to “RoKo, stop that.” Highlighting Kohli’s superior record, especially in SENA countries, he asserted the two belong to different leagues in red-ball cricket, despite their white-ball reputations often being clubbed together.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 above 25,100; BSE Sensex opens in green
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Tuesday. While Nifty50 was above 25,100, BSE Sensex was above 82,500.

title: Meghalaya horror: Bride returned home 4 days after wedding to plot murder, say cops
content: A honeymoon trip in Meghalaya turned deadly when Raja Raghuvanshi was found murdered, initially suspected as a robbery gone wrong. However, investigations revealed a chilling plot involving his bride, Sonam, and her alleged lover, Raj Kushwaha.

title: Techie-lover stabs mom of two to death in Bengaluru hotel room
content: In a tragic turn of events, a 33-year-old woman, Harini R, was murdered by her 25-year-old lover, Yashas, in a Bengaluru hotel. The incident occurred after Harini decided to end their affair. Enraged, Yashas stabbed her multiple times. He later informed the police and attempted self-harm. Yashas has been arrested and is in police custody, while authorities investigate the crime.

title: SC clears Banke Bihari corridor in Mathura
content: Following Supreme Court approval, Mathura authorities initiated a land survey for the Banke Bihari corridor amidst local protests. The project aims to improve pilgrim experience with better facilities and crowd management after a 2022 stampede.

title: SC rejects plea of Thug Life release in K'taka: 'There are threats of arson'
content: The Supreme Court declined to protect cinemas screening 'Thug Life' in Karnataka after threats from pro-Kannada groups angered by Kamal Haasan's language comments. The Kannada Rakshana Vedike threatened arson, prompting a plea for security. Justice Mishra dismissed the petition, advising theatres to "keep fire extinguishers ready" and seek help from the High Court.

title: 'Faster than a pickpocket': Shastri's hilarious tribute as Dhoni inducted into ICC Hall of Fame
content: Former head coach Ravi Shastri hilariously compared MS Dhoni’s lightning-fast wicketkeeping to a “pickpocket” as the former India captain was inducted into the ICC Hall of Fame. Shastri praised Dhoni's composure and legacy. Dhoni called the honour “something I will cherish forever,” cementing his place among cricket’s all-time greats across all formats.

title: LA protests enter fourth day: Trump deploys 700 Marines; Newsom calls move ‘deranged’
content: Tensions rise between California and the White House. This follows violent protests in Los Angeles over immigration arrests. The Trump administration plans to deploy Marines. Governor Newsom condemns the move and announces a lawsuit. Protests erupted after ICE arrests. Many claim the arrests targeted peaceful migrants. International figures voice concerns. Chuck Schumer calls for Trump to revoke the order.

title: Dissent and equipment misuse: Ashwin heavily fined; viral moment sparks debate
content: Former India all-rounder Ravichandran Ashwin was fined 30% of his match fee for showing dissent and misusing equipment during a TNPL 2025 match. Upset over an LBW decision, he argued with the umpire and vented frustration while leaving the field. The incident went viral, sparking online debate and support for Ashwin.

title: Ax-4: All eyes on weather, SpaceX fixing minor rocket snags
content: SpaceX is targeting June 11 for the Ax-4 mission launch, closely monitoring weather conditions with a slight increase in probability violation. Technical snags, including a liquid oxygen leak and a thrust vector control issue, have been resolved. The mission features a new, improved Dragon capsule with enhanced systems and marks the second flight for the Falcon-9 booster.

title: 'Very difficult, but ...': Pooran retires from int'l cricket at 29, leaves behind a proud legacy
content: West Indies' Nicholas Pooran, a dynamic force in white-ball cricket, has retired from international play at 29. The record-holding T20I run-scorer expressed gratitude in an emotional post, recalling his pride in leading the team. Despite a ball-tampering incident in 2019, Pooran captained the team, achieving a series win against Australia.

title: Top stocks to buy or sell: Stock market recommendations for June 10
content: Stock market recommendations: Mirae Asset Sharekhan recommends buying Indus Tower and Jindal Steel & Power. Indus Tower, exhibiting a Triangle pattern breakout, has a target of Rs 440. Jindal Steel & Power, emerging from a bullish flag pattern, aims for Rs 1,065.

title: Trump keeps Tesla, Musk keeps quiet; 'big, beautiful' feud over?
content: Elon Musk appears to be softening his stance towards Donald Trump after a public feud, showing support for the administration's immigration policies and reposting Trump's messages. Trump reciprocated by stating he would keep his Tesla and maintain Starlink service, signaling a potential reconciliation.

title: Frederick Forsyth death: 10 remarkable facts about the master storyteller—that seem fake
content: Forsyth’s life was as compelling as his fiction: a Royal Air Force pilot, a war reporter censored by the BBC, an MI6 asset, and a bestselling novelist whose understanding of realpolitik was sharp enough to worry governments. He wrote thrillers, yes—but thrillers with classified undertones.

title: Los Angeles protests: Why are Waymo robotaxis being torched?
content: Amidst tense protests in Los Angeles following immigration raids, several Waymo self-driving taxis were vandalized and set ablaze. Demonstrators, expressing anger towards law enforcement and perceived Big Tech inequality, targeted the robotaxis. At least five Waymo vehicles were destroyed, raising safety concerns due to burning lithium-ion batteries releasing toxic gases.

title: 'Thug Life' box office collection Day 5: Film makes it past Rs 40 crore mark
content: Kamal Haasan and Mani Ratnam's reunion film, Thug Life, has earned over Rs 40 crore in India within five days. Despite a strong opening of Rs 15.5 crore, the film is experiencing a decline in collections, earning only Rs 3.25 crore on Monday. Mixed reviews and controversy in Karnataka, stemming from Haasan's remarks, have impacted the film's performance.

title: Army to get new air defence boost with Rs 30,000 crore QR-SAM deal
content: India's defence ministry is set to approve the procurement of indigenous Quick Reaction Surface to Air Missile (QR-SAM) systems for the Army, costing ₹30,000 crore. These highly mobile systems, with a range of 25-30 km, can intercept hostile aerial threats.

title: Amid Bengaluru stampede row, Sidda & DKS summoned to Delhi
content: Karnataka CM Siddaramaiah and DK Shivakumar are summoned to Delhi by Rahul Gandhi for a damage-control meeting following the Bengaluru stampede that killed 11 RCB fans. The Congress party faces criticism for allegedly shifting blame, prompting the high command to seek a detailed briefing on the administration's response.

title: Watch: Team India begins nets practice in England; Gill, Pant, Bumrah in focus
content: Team India began practice ahead of the first Test against England, starting June 20 in Leeds. A training video featured Shubman Gill, Rishabh Pant, Jasprit Bumrah, Ravindra Jadeja and others sharpening skills in Beckenham. With Rohit and Kohli retired, the Gill-led side prepares for a challenging five-match series in English conditions.

title: Govt targeting 2034 to hold 1st 'one nation, one election'
content: India anticipates holding nationwide simultaneous elections by 2034, contingent on the passage of a constitutional amendment. State assemblies elected after 2029 will have shorter terms to align with the 2034 general elections. A joint parliamentary committee is reviewing the 'one nation, one election' bill, potentially extending its tenure to visit states and gather feedback before finalizing recommendations.

title: 'Pro-family initiative': Trump proposes $1,000 investment accounts for newborns
content: Donald Trump on Monday introduced 'Trump accounts,' a federal initiative offering $1,000 investment accounts for American children born between 2025 and 2029. Supported by business leaders like Michael Dell and David Solomon, the plan allows additional contributions up to $5,000 annually. House Speaker Mike Johnson praised it as a pro-family initiative.

title: Vijay Mallya still owes Rs 7,000 crore, repayment claims 'baseless', banks say
content: Despite Vijay Mallya's claims of settling his debts, the government and banks assert that he still owes a substantial amount. While banks have recovered Rs 10,815 crore from Kingfisher Airlines' dues, a gap of Rs 6,997 crore remains. Mallya's assertions appear to consider only the principal amount, neglecting accrued interest and penal charges, as lenders continue recovery efforts.

title: How ISS-bound Shubhanshu Shukla once skipped sister’s vidai to give NDA exam
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, once a teen who secretly took the NDA exam during his sister’s wedding, is now set to become the first Indian to visit the ISS. Inspired by an IAF airshow, he rose through the ranks to become a decorated fighter pilot and astronaut. His family in Lucknow beams with pride as he embarks on this historic mission.

title: 'Surrender or get eliminated': Maoist politburo down to four; only 300 cadres left
content: The CPI (Maoist) group, once a major threat, is now significantly weakened. Key leaders have been arrested, killed, or died. The politburo and central committee numbers have dwindled. Only a few armed cadres remain scattered. Security forces have offered surrender options. The organisation faces fragmentation due to sustained operations. The command structure is in tatters.

title: Thane train tragedy: 4 families shattered; one victim died en route to buy his dream home
content: The Mumbra train accident claimed the lives of four individuals, shattering their families' dreams. Mayur Shah, an IT engineer, was on his way to purchase a property. GRP constable Vicky Mukhyadal was returning home after his night shift. Rahul Gupta, a stationery shop helper, supported his family, and Ketan Saroj, a BPO employee, fell from the crowded train.

title: Maoist IED kills ASP in Sukma; 2 officers injured; blast came after arson trap
content: In Sukma's Konta, a Maoist IED blast killed ASP Akash Rao Girepunje, a gallantry medal recipient, and injured two other officers. Girepunje was leading a patrol to investigate a previous arson when the explosion occurred. The police suspect the arson was a trap to lure them, and the IED was planted soon after.

title: Appendix cancer rising in millennials: Study finds cases quadrupled for young adults
content: Appendix cancer cases have quadrupled among millennials, according to a new study. Learn about early symptoms, possible causes, and why young adults should be paying attention to this rare but rising cancer trend.

title: NDA govt has delivered significant changes in 11 yrs, will do more: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi celebrated 11 years in office, highlighting the NDA government's achievements and commitment to building a 'Viksit Bharat'. He emphasized the representation of SC, ST, and OBC ministers, women-led development, and India's economic growth and global leadership.

title: 'Golden period' or 'only propaganda': BJP, Cong spar as PM Modi's NDA govt marks 11 yrs in office
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi marked 11 years of his government, highlighting India's development under the NDA, guided by "Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas, Sabka Vishwas, Sabka Prayas." The BJP celebrated this milestone, while the Congress criticized the government, alleging a weakening of constitutional institutions and unfulfilled promises.

title: Panthers clobber Oilers: Grades, key players, big questions for both teams
content: The score was 6-1, and Florida was in control from the start. Here's how it all happened, and what comes next.

title: Panthers pounce on mistake-prone Oilers in rout
content: The Panthers seized control of what had been a tight Stanley Cup Final after two games, dominating the discombobulated Oilers 6-1 in Game 3.

title: Murray State beats Duke, advances to first MCWS
content: Luke Mistone hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning Monday night to help No. 4 seed Murray State beat Duke 5-4 and advance to the program's first Men's College World Series.

title: Top prospect Anthony goes hitless in MLB debut
content: Red Sox OF Roman Anthony made his major league debut Monday, going 0-for-4 with an RBI in Boston's 10-8 loss to Tampa Bay in 11 innings.

title: FAMU AD accused of stealing $24K from old job
content: Florida A&M athletic director Angela Suggs was arrested Monday on fraud and theft charges for allegedly using a corporate credit card for personal use totaling more than $24,000 at her former job.

title: Packers cut CB Alexander after contract impasse
content: The Packers have released two-time Pro Bowl cornerback Jaire Alexander after the sides couldn't come to an agreement on a revised contract.

title: Pulisic likes dad's response to Donovan criticism
content: Christian Pulisic's dad, Mark, hit back at Landon Donovan on Monday after the U.S. soccer great appeared to criticize the midfielder for his decision to sit out the upcoming Gold Cup to rest after wrapping up his season with AC Milan.

title: QB Maye 'starting to find a stride' in new offense
content: Patriots quarterback Drake Maye says he believes he's starting to "find a stride" in Josh McDaniels' new offense during minicamp practices.

title: Capitals star Oshie retires after 16 NHL seasons
content: T.J. Oshie, who helped the Capitals win the Stanley Cup in 2018, announced Monday he is retiring after playing 16 NHL seasons.

title: Still-too-early MLB All-Stars: AL, NL roster predictions and biggest debates
content: Freddie Freeman vs. Pete Alonso? Tarik Skubal vs. Kris Bubic? Here's our one-month-out look at who will make it to Atlanta.

title: 2025 NBA Finals: NBA experts debate Thunder-Pacers Game 3 storylines, what's next
content: The Thunder evened the series on Sunday with a win over the Pacers. Here's what to watch heading into Game 3.

title: Fantasy baseball: What to expect from Red Sox prospect Roman Anthony
content: The Boston Red Sox have called up top prospect Roman Anthony. Should fantasy managers do whatever it takes to get him?

title: OTA no-shows to minicamp holdouts? Intel on key players who skipped offseason work
content: Several key players, such as Haason Reddick and T.J. Watt, missed OTAs, but this week's camp isn't voluntary. Will they show?

title: U.S. Open tiers: Ranking every player in the field at Oakmont
content: Can anyone stop Scottie Scheffler? Will Rory McIlroy find his game? We break down the U.S. Open field at Oakmont from the clear favorites all the way to the players looking to make the cut.

title: 'The best show in town': Dan Mullen wants to win in style at UNLV
content: After spending a few years on TV, the coach is back at the helm of a college program and looking to make a statement.

title: 2025 NBA Finals: SGA leads Thunder to Game 2 bounce-back
content: NBA insiders break down OKC's 123-107 win over the Pacers and biggest takeaways from Game 2 of the 2025 Finals.

title: The Big Two? This Alcaraz-Sinner rivalry is epic
content: Sinner and Alcaraz have combined to win the last six Grand Slams -- and are pushing each other to new heights in the sport.

title: NCAA athlete pay: Here's what's next
content: Schools will begin directly paying their athletes in less than a month, thanks to a legal settlement that was officially approved in federal court Friday. However, the situation is far from settled.

title: Who won the men's transfer portal? Let's rank the 13 best teams
content: These teams got the best players from the transfer portal -- with some familiar faces in the mix for top spot.

title: After Copa América 'disaster,' FIFA is using Club World Cup to be ready for 2026
content: Players slammed the pitch conditions in the U.S. for the Copa América. FIFA is making sure the Club World Cup and 2026 World Cup are different.

title: Source: USMNT's Turner to join Lyon in $9M move
content: United States goalkeeper Matt Turner is set for a move to Lyon, with the Ligue 1 club agreeing on a $9.1 million fee with Premier League side Nottingham Forest, a source confirmed to ESPN.

title: Adams out for U.S.-Swiss friendly, Gold Cup at risk
content: Bournemouth midfielder Tyler Adams is set to miss the United States friendly against Switzerland on Tuesday and is a possible doubt for the start of the Gold Cup, according to manager Mauricio Pochettino.

title: Lewandowski: Poland boss 'betrayed my trust'
content: Robert Lewandowski says he feels betrayed by coach Michał Probierz and that it will be difficult to forget the events which led to him stepping away from Poland.

title: Italy give sacked Spalletti winning sendoff in WCQ
content: Sacked Italy manager Luciano Spalletti bowed out with a victory after his side laboured to an uninspired 2-0 home win over Moldova in their World Cup qualification match on Monday thanks to goals from Giacomo Raspadori and Andrea Cambiaso.

title: Sources: Spurs hopeful of naming Frank as coach
content: Tottenham Hotspur are increasingly hopeful of appointing Thomas Frank as their new head coach, sources have told ESPN.

title: Man City complete $42.2M deal for LB Aït-Nouri
content: Manchester City have completed the signing of Wolves' left-back Rayan Aït-Nouri, the club have announced.

title: UFC 316 clears the way for much-anticipated bantamweight showdowns
content: Two blockbuster fights seem imminent for the UFC 316 main card winners, while next steps for the losers are murkier.

title: Stanley Cup Final odds: Sam Bennett gains ground in Conn Smythe odds
content: Top ways to bet the series and props for the Stanley Cup Final between the Florida Panthers and Edmonton Oilers.

title: Waiver wire: A pair of Blue Jays deserve your attention
content: Tristan H. Cockcroft outlines who should be claimed off the waiver wire and who should be dropped from fantasy rosters.

title: Kate Martin has arrived, Odyssey Sims thriving
content: Kate Martin has become a key scoring specialist for the Valkyries that could prove rewarding in fantasy while Odyssey Sims continues to break out in Los Angeles.

title: Transfer trends: Portugal-to-Prem pipeline, Italy is Europe's retirement home
content: Diving into 2,000 transfers, ESPN's Bill Connelly identifies the good, the bad and the ugly market trends since 2015.

title: Portugal's impressive Nations League win over Spain outshines Ronaldo vs. Yamal
content: Portugal's collective quality won the day -- and the headlines -- over Spain's impressive young talent.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool join race to sign Ekitike
content: The reigning Premier League champions are eyeing a move for Eintracht Frankfurt striker Hugo Ekitike. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

content: the day of the Jackal and other top 9 picks of Frederick Forsyth How to train your brain to be happier: 10 simple habits Top 10 train rides in india that turn magical during monsoon Bollywood actresses and their love for handloom sarees .

title: Honeymoon Murder Updates: Sonam, Prime Accused In Raja Raghuvanshi's Murder, Under 72 Hours Remand, Will Be Flown To Guwahati
content: Meghalaya Honeymoon Murder Case Live: Sonam had reportedly gone missing after her husband's body was discovered in a gorge beneath the Weisawdong Falls parking lot in East Khasi Hills on June 2.

title: In Sinister Plot, Sonam's Lover Consoles Her Father At Husband's Funeral
content: The boyfriend of the Indore woman arrested for allegedly killing her husband during their honeymoon in Meghalaya was seen consoling her father when the victim's body was brought home.

title: Siddaramaiah, DK Shivakumar To Brief Congress High Command On Stampede Incident
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah and Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar will meet the Congress high command in New Delhi on Tuesday to discuss various developments, including June 4 stampede in Bengaluru that killed 11 people.

title: Amid Putin-Xi Bonhomie, Russian Intelligence Cautious Of "Enemy" China
content: While the world sees Russian President Vladimir Putin and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping as unshakable friends, a leaked internal document from Russia's Federal Security Service (FSB) sheds light on Moscow's growing distrust toward Beijing.

title: Chenab Bridge Project Engineer's New Post On "Unnecessary" Fame
content: Madhavi Latha, who has been involved with the Chenab Bridge for 17 years, spoke about the headlines that described her as the "woman behind the mission".

title: Chinese PhD Student From Wuhan Tries To Smuggle "Biological Materials" To US
content: A Chinese researcher from Wuhan, from where Covid-19 is suspected to have spread to the world, has been arrested for allegedly trying to smuggle "biological materials" into the US in a second such incident in less than a week.

title: "Nobody Dared To...": Witness On Indian Man Being Pinned Down At US Airport
content: There were communication issues between the Indian man and the officials as the former was speaking in Hindi and Haryanvi, Kunal Jain said.

title: Goa Health Minister Asked If He Would Apologise To Doctor. What He Told NDTV
content: Vishwajit Rane, the health minister of Goa who stirred up controversy after suspending a doctor over patient care and then apologising, said he would not apologise again.

title: Indian Man Handcuffed, Pinned To Floor At US Airport, India Embassy Responds
content: The disturbing footage shows the student pinned to the ground as at least four officials held him down, with two of them keeping their knees on his back.

title: Trump Sends Additional Troops To LA As Immigration Protests Escalate
content: US President Donald Trump has ordered the temporary deployment of about 700 Marines to Los Angeles, as he pledged those protesting his aggressive immigration policies would be "hit harder" than ever.

title: "Sonam Claimed She Was Drugged, Brought To UP": Top Cop On Honeymoon Murder
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi was arrested for allegedly killing her husband, Raja Raghuvanshi, when the newly married couple were on their honeymoon in Meghalaya.

title: "Touch The Sky With Glory": Air Force's Big Shout Out To Shubhanshu Shukla
content: Air Chief Marshal Amar Preet Singh spoke to Group Captain Shukla through a video call and wished him luck for a "safe and successful trip" to space.

title: Sexual Wellness Firm Head Found Guilty Of Forcing Employees Into Sex Acts
content: The founder of the sexual wellness company OneTaste was convicted in New York of engaging in a yearslong forced-labor scheme by manipulating employees and some participants in the firm's educational courses.

title: US Health Secretary RFK Jr Fires Entire Vaccine Advisory Panel
content: US Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. on Monday announced he was dismissing all current members of a key federal vaccine advisory panel, accusing them of conflicts of interest -- his latest salvo against the nation's immunisation policies.

title: Goa Minister Must Apologise Publicly Else We Will Go On Strike, Warns Doctor
content: Rudresh Kuttikar, Chief Medical Officer of Goa Medical College and Hospital, who was berated by state health minister Vishwajit Rane, has demanded that Mr Rane must issue a public apology "immediately".

title: Why Most-Followed TikToker Khaby Lame Was Detained By US Immigration
content: Khaby Lame, the world's most-followed social media star on TikTok, is making waves for all the wrong reasons.

title: Everything New Coming to iPhones, iPads and Macs Later This Year
content: As part of its rebranding efforts, Apple confirmed that it will use years, not version numbers, to identify its software. The upgraded platforms announced Monday, for instance, include iOS 26, iPadOS 26, tvOS 26, macOS 26, watchOS 26 and visionOS 26.

title: "Careless Dumping Days Behind Us": Delhi To Get India's 1st E-Waste Eco Park
content: Once up and running, the park will manage nearly 25 per cent of Delhi's e-waste and will serve as a model for similar initiatives across the country.

title: Raja Raghuvanshi Hit On Front And Back Of Head: Honeymoon Murder Autopsy
content: Indore-based businessman Raja Raghuvanshi was attacked twice - once each on the back and front of his head - a preliminary autopsy report found, per police sources.

title: Trump Says Meeting On Iran Planned For Thursday
content: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday said the U.S. and Iran would continue talks on Thursday for a nuclear deal, adding that Tehran was a tough negotiator and that the main impediment to an agreement was over enrichment.

title: 💰 Nadal's winning racket sells for record price
content: a racket used by Rafael Nadal during his 2017 French Open final sold at a Prestige Memorabilia auction for $157,333.20 including buyer's premium on Sunday . the previous record was a Racket he used during the 2022 Australian Open . in 2017, he defeated Stan Wawrinka in straight sets, 6-2, 6-3, 6-1, for his record-extending 10th french Open title .

title: From QB battles to rookie progress, here's everything we're watching at minicamps
content: the second week of NFL minicamps kicks off with 30 teams gathering for workouts after the Detroit Lions canceled their sessions . it's a chance to see who shows up after skipping voluntary workouts, how rookies perform against veterans, and how offensive and defensive systems look under new coordinators . the team has insisted that Cook will be playing for the Bills this season .

title: NBA offseason 2025: 10 teams to watch this summer
content: the 2025 offseason resembles this season's trade deadline . a list of 10 teams we're watching closely this summer . the 2024 champion Boston Celtics could change the landscape of the offseason, says a team . click here for all the latest NBA news .

title: NBA Finals betting: Thunder huge title favorites after blowout win
content: Oklahoma City Thunder beat the Indiana Pacers 123-107 in game 2 . the Thunder moved from -325 to -550 to win the title while the Pacers dropped down from +260 to +415 . in the finals MVP race, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (-550) is still the favorite by a wide margin .

title: Why Napheesa Collier is the easy choice for MVP
content: the WNBA season began just over three weeks ago . some teams have played only seven of their 44 regular-season games . but it's never too early to take stock of the candidates for MVP, Rookie of the year, Coach of the Year and several other end-of-season honors.

title: Sources: City closing on $45.6M deal for Cherki
content: the 21-year-old is set to arrive in a €40 million ($45.6 million) deal . a medical has been penciled in for Tuesday, and there's hope he will join pep Guardiola's squad ahead of the FIFA Club World Cup .

title: Trump reacts to 'kidnapping' of Greta Thunberg, says 'she should do anger management'

title: Sandalwood grower climbs electricity tower to protest in Chikkamagaluru
content: He is among farmers who are demanding adequate compensation from the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) for sandalwood trees that were cut for widening NH 206

title: Maximum boasts, minimum achievements: Congress slams Home Minister Amit Shah
content: "Never has India had a Union Home Minister whose tenure has been one of Maximum Boasts, Minimum Achievements unless what he has been able to do for his son can count for that," Senior Congress leader Jairam Ramesh said

title: PM Modi says NDA govt. focussed on modernisation, self-reliance in defence production
content: Mr. Modi shared a thread from a government’s citizen engagement platform, which highlighted the changes in different areas as the Prime Minister completed 11 years in office on Tuesday (June 10, 2025)

title: Wazahat Khan, the man who filed FIR against influencer Sharmistha Panoli, arrested in Kolkata
content: The 29-year-old Wazahat Khan has been booked under Bhartiya Nyay Sanghita’s Sections 196(1)(a)/299/352/353(1)(c). He was absconding for the past 10 days.

title: BJP minority cell to publicise Operation Sindoor; reach out to Muslims
content: “The party will launch the campaign from tomorrow with distribution of pocket-sized copies of the Constitution to raise awareness among minorities about their rights and duties,” Uttar Pradesh BJP minority cell president Kunwar Basit Ali said

title: 2 killed, 2 injured after being run over by goods train in Chhattisgarh
content: As per preliminary information, nearly 11 labourers, including the victims, were heading towards Kusumkasa on foot on the railway tracks

title: TMC MP Saket Gokhale issues public apology to former diplomat Lakshmi Puri
content: I unconditionally apologise for having put-out a series of tweets against Amb. Lakshmi Murdeshwar Puri on 13th and 23rd June 2021..., says Trinamool Congress (TMC) MP Saket Gokhale

title: E-2W firm Quantum Energy breaks ground for 2 lakh unit facility near Hyderabad
content: Spread across 2.4 lakh sq ft near the proposed Future City,  in Maheshwaram, near Hyderabad, it  will a net zero facility.

title: Odisha: Survivors of sexual assault kill accused, burn his body
content: They went to his house, where he was sleeping, and hacked the man to death with the help of other survivors. Two men had also assisted the women, police said

title: CBI arrests U.P. CGST superintendent in bribery case
content: CGST Superintendent Nishan Singh Malli had allegedly issued penalty notice to a businessman, who controls the private company, on account of non-filing of GST returns

title: How drones are the new face of warfare
content: The ubiquitous drone is rapidly becoming the weapon of choice in active combat, serving as a force multiplier to achieve strategic objectives while blurring the distinctions between military-grade and commercial technologies

title: Meghalaya murder: One of the accused took people to man's funeral in Indore
content: Raja Raghuvanshi, an Indore-based transport businessman whose body was found a week back in Meghalaya, was allegedly killed by men hired by his wife Sonam

title: Delhi temperature shoots to 49°C; orange alert issued amid heatwave
content: The actual maximum temperature in the city touched 43.4°C on Monday, 3.4° higher than the seasonal average.

title: How extracting and producing nickel can be made more sustainable
content: Nickel is an important metal used in several clean energy technologies, especially electric vehicles. The demand for it is expected to surpass six million tonnes a year by 2040. However, producing just one tonne of nickel can result in more than 20 tonnes of carbon dioxide emissions

title: A.P. Mahila Commission to serve notices on Sakshi, Kommineni and Krishnam Raju over ‘offensive comments’
content: Some people are targeting women on the pretext of freedom of expression, says A.P. Mahila Commission Chairperson

title: The story of how heeng came to be successfully cultivated in India
content: The first flowering and seed set of heeng at Palampur was reported on May 28, 2025, by CSIR, showing heeng can indeed be successfully cultivated in India; until early last decade India depended on imports; the government subsequently launched a national effort to promote indigenous cultivation which was led by the IHBT in Palampur, Himachal Pradesh

title: YSRCP condemns arrest of journalist, calls it a blot on democracy
content: Journalist Kommineni Srinivasa Rao has been arrested in connection with the alleged derogatory remarks made by analyst Krishnam Raju against women from Amaravati during a show aired on Sakshi TV

title: Andhra Pradesh has become a hotbed of anarchy, says Jagan
content: The YSRCP president takes a dig at the government over the arrest of senior journalist Kommineni Srinivasa Rao

title: Senior journalist arrested over controversial debate
content: The arrest was made based on a police complaint lodged by Kambampati Sireesha, a leader of Amaravati Capital Farmers’ Dalit JAC and a resident of Rayapudi in Thullur mandal

title: Software exports of STPI-Hyderabad units rose 15% to over ₹1.42 lakh crore in FY25
content: STPI-Hyderabad Directorate has been instrumental in nurturing the IT industry and tech startup ecosystem in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana

title: Hyderabad malls open sans occupancy certificate, GHMC looks away
content: There are several instances of large commercial buildings, including malls and multiplexes, operating without necessary clearances, such as the mandatory Occupancy Certificate

title: Rain to intensify in north Tamil Nadu, might bring relief from searing heat
content: Some places in Tamil Nadu and Puducherry may experience thunderstorms and gusty winds of speed reaching 30-40 kmph

title: Chief Minister  Siddaramaiah to inaugurate Kusum-C project on June 11
content: The KUSUM–C  scheme aims to provide farmers with reliable daytime electricity by installing solar units near agricultural electricity feeders

title: ‘Kapiraj’ by SCR Vijayawada bags top prize at All India Hindi drama fest
content: The play, performed by a 15-member team, explored the themes of loyalty, betrayal, destiny and justice.

title: Court pulls up Tihar jail authorities for missing security files of AgustaWestland accused
content: The remarks came after the Tihar authorities submitted in the court that the original report sought by the court was “not traceable despite best efforts”.

title: Phone tapping case: main accused appears before West Zone police
content: T. Prabhakar Rao has been citing ill health to stay in the US  after the case was registered by Punjagutta police of Telangana more than a year ago.

title: Centre meets Kuki-Zo groups, discusses opening of highways, surrender of weapons
content: At the meeting, the insurgent groups were conveyed about ground rules violations and were also asked to shut down or relocate camps close to the Meitei-inhabited areas

title: Bengaluru stampede | Lessons to be learnt, may come up with act for gatherings, says D.K. Shivakumar
content: Karnataka Deputy CM plans to bring in an Act for future public gatherings after tragic stampede and criticises Opposition politicizing the issue

title: Indian man facing difficulties at Newark airport, Indian Consulate in touch with authorities
content: A video, posted online by an Indian-American social entrepreneur, Kunal Jain, shows the Indian man pinned to the ground by Port Authority Police and being handcuffed.

title: Punjab to set up robust rehab system as more addicts come forward
content: The sub-committee has also directed the Health Department to submit a comprehensive proposal within a week for recruitment of all necessary health staff, he added.

title: Manoj Jha questions Centre’s intentions for caste census
content: The RJD leader says the BJP-led government only wants to create confusion in the name of caste census, questions the reason behind govt. deciding to not release population figures of OBCs

title: PM Modi to visit Cyprus, Croatia during his trip to Canada
content: The visit to Cyprus is seen as a message to Türkiye, which had assisted Pakistan during Operation Sindoor; the stopover at Croatia is important in the context of India-Middle East-Europe Economic Corridor

title: West Bengal BJP holds rally over TMC leader’s ‘vile’ remarks on women
content: The BJP leadership led by Suvendu Adhikari organised a Nari Samman Yatra  in Bolpur. In a viral audio the TMC leader is heard abusing and threatening the police officer using vile language not only against him but also his wife and mother

title: MHA sanctions additional ₹25 crore for over 2,000 homes and properties destroyed in Pakistani shelling in Punjab, J&K
content: Modi announces additional compensation of ₹2 lakh for each fully damaged house and ₹1 lakh for each partially damaged house

title: Kharge backs Rahul Gandhi’s call for electoral transparency in Maharashtra
content: Congress says EC’s credibility at stake; welcomes possible move to publish voter rolls for Maharashtra, Haryana

title: After series of accidents, DGCA to review Char Dham yatra helicopter operations

title: Tamil Nadu government opposes the Hindu Munnani event in Madurai,  citing Bengaluru stampede
content: The State government informs the Madurai Bench of the Madras High Court that it is willing to grant permission for only three days to the Hindu Munnani for installing temporary miniatures of the six abodes of Lord Murugan at the ‘Muruga Bakthargalin Aanmeega Maanadu’

title: Mamata Banerjee holds meet on COVID preparedness, says there is no reason to panic

title: Congress defector given top party post by TMC

title: CM Siddaramaiah’s call to celebrate attracted crowds: RCB
content: ‘The only ‘act’ stated to have been committed by RCSPL is the invitation [through social media posts] to the public to participate in the celebrations. This, per se, cannot, by any stretch of the imagination, be considered a criminal act,’ says RCB

title: Congress high command summons CM, DKS for discussion on Bengaluru stampede incident
content: The case pertaining to the stampede outside the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium is also coming up in the Karnataka High Court for hearing today

title: Health dept. reiterates steps to prevent COVID-19 transmission
content: Masking in public places as well as in closed spaces like auditoriums and maintaining cough etiquette are important to prevent the transmission. Those with comorbidities asked to strictly adhere to masking mandate

title: Tiger mauls temple caretaker to death in Ranthambore Fort

title: 21,887 students given Plus One admission in second allotment

title: Foreign investors shift money out of Delhi to ‘promising’ Maharashtra
content: Despite remaining among the top 5 FDI destinations in the last 10 years, Delhi’s share fell to 12% in 2024-25 from 32% in 2015-16, while Maharashtra grew from 24% in 2015-16 to 39% in 2024-25; experts attribute gravitation to ‘predictable returns’

title: Killed in Sikkim landslide, soldier flown home to Lakshadweep 2,500 km away
